name: Tappy
description:
The first release of Tappy is here, free to play! 

You have been captured by Sr McDoom, and now you have to compete in musical battle competitions.

Use your mouse to knock back bullets. That's it!

New features will come in later updates!

Special thanks to ninjamuffin99 for the inspiration to make this game!

Play it on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/791135?updated=1619545735
